commitMessage:
@@@Feature/geode 7258 2 (#4250)

GEODE-7258: The function retry logic is modified to handle exception
thrown.  while trying to connect to a server thats shutdown/closed.

    Co-authored-by: Anil <agingade@pivotal.io>
    Co-authored-by: Xiaojian Zhou <gzhou@pivotal.io>

@@@GEODE-8770: RollingUpgradeDUnitTest assigns ports (#5819)

RollingUpgradeDUnitTest now assigns available HTTP and JMX ports when
launching and rolling locators.  rather than using the default ports.
This allows the tests to run in parallel outside of docker.
